column4: Can anybody help me troubleshoot why this external USB drive isn't showing up?
does dmesg report anything when you plug it in / disconnect it
Yes, but I can't see it mounting. http://pastebin.com/d7fcb613a
Ah, more error info showed up in dmesg out put:
ok i'm not sure. someone else maybe have a look -  who else awas helpin
when you say nuke, you mean you wantt o perminatly delte the file or something?
is this drive being sent back as faulty?

I have my old ubuntu drive in a USB caddy. It mounted last week and I backed up my old data.  Now I need to  sanitize the drive and send it back (it was replaced under warranty) and it won't mount so I can't overwrite it.
It just mounted under winxp, tho.  Hm.
throw the drive in the air and let it hit your carpet
if the drive is being replaced as faulty, rubber mallet is good industry, otherwise, air and carpet work well, as it leaves no physical marks
doo IT man, don't they expect a f**ked drive in the post anyway?
Well,I'll go have some drinks and see if it seems like a good idea when I get home :-).
